item.title: Week 10 preview: Why Georgia's matchup with Florida just means more, plus key matchups
item.description: Key matchups and the story behind why Georgia quarterback Gunner Stockton really wants a win against Florida.

item.title: How Vanderbilt has gone from SEC doormat to CFP contender
item.description: After years of being a punching bag, coach Clark Lea and the 7-1 Commodores are showing plenty of fight.

item.title: Nebraska's Rhule signs extension through 2032
item.description: Nebraska has signed coach Matt Rhule to a two-year contract extension which will take him through the 2032 season, the school announced Thursday.

item.title: Rose Bowl, city sue UCLA for alleged SoFi plan
item.description: The Rose Bowl and the city of Pasadena have sued UCLA for allegedly trying to move its games to the newer SoFi Stadium, which is closer to campus.

item.title: Lions OC feels he 'failed' WR Williams, eyes fixes
item.description: Lions offensive coordinator Morton met with Jameson Williams privately during the bye week to figure out how to get the wide receiver more involved in...
